title: How to transfer old emails from a Thunderbird POP account to new Thunderbird Owl-EWS account
content:
Hey, I recently had to switch my email accounts, which use Office.365 servers, from using a POP account to Exchange, as apparently Microsoft stopped supporting POP. I have a new install of Thunderbird 102.12 (running on Windows 10). I have installed the OWL add-on, so the email accounts are now using "OWL-EWS" server protocol. Everything works fine, as far as my different email accounts sending and receiving new emails.

My problem is trying to import my old 20+ years of emails and the whole folder heirarchy from all my past clients and business dealings into the new install of Thunderbird. I have tried using the import method with various file types, I have tried just copying the folders in manually. Nothing seems to work, I either get errors or Thunderbird just doesn't recognize the old folders.

FYI - I also have bought the full paid version of the Thunderbird Migration Wizard software from recoverytools.com. With this, I can change my old emails folders/files into practically any format.

What is the proper way to import my old stuff??? This is driving me crazy and really killing my business productivity.

I would appreciate any pointers, I can't be the only one having issues with this.... thanks!
